rows.text: That’s wonderful! Well done for spending time together. It lays the foundation for a great relationship with your teen!

text.eng: That’s wonderful! Well done for spending time together. It lays the foundation for a great relationship with your teen!

rows.text: Good for you! One-on-one time shows your teens they are important to you. It really makes a difference!

text.eng: Good for you! One-on-one time shows your teens they are important to you. It really makes a difference!

rows.text: Wonderful! Spending time with your teen may make your teen more willing to help out more often. You are doing great!

text.eng: Wonderful! Spending time with your teen may make your teen more willing to help out more often. You are doing great!

rows.text: Well done! One-on-one time with your teen gives you a chance to learn more about your teen’s interests and abilities. You are a star!

text.eng: Well done! One-on-one time with your teen gives you a chance to learn more about your teen’s interests and abilities. You are a star!

rows.text: Excellent job! Spending time together helps to build a strong and positive relationship between you and your teen.

text.eng: Excellent job! Spending time together helps to build a strong and positive relationship between you and your teen.

rows.text: Sometimes it will be easy and fun to spend time with your teens, and sometimes it will be more challenging. Spending time together will greatly improve your relationship; well done for trying!

text.eng: Sometimes it will be easy and fun to spend time with your teens, and sometimes it will be more challenging. Spending time together will greatly improve your relationship; well done for trying!

rows.text: Sorry to hear that it was difficult for you to spend time with your teen. We all have challenges sometimes. Just be patient with yourself and your teen - things will get better. Well done for trying!

text.eng: Sorry to hear that it was difficult for you to spend time with your teen. We all have challenges sometimes. Just be patient with yourself and your teen - things will get better. Well done for trying!

rows.text: Great to hear it went well; you are a star!

text.eng: Great to hear it went well; you are a star!

rows.text: Sorry to hear it was difficult for you. Well done for trying!

text.eng: Sorry to hear it was difficult for you. Well done for trying!

rows.text: Wonderful! You deserve all the happy times!

text.eng: Wonderful! You deserve all the happy times!

rows.text: Sorry that this was difficult for you. You are a star for trying!

text.eng: Sorry that this was difficult for you. You are a star for trying!

rows.text: Amazing to hear it made you feel good! Keep up the great work. Your teen is learning so much from you!

text.eng: Amazing to hear it made you feel good! Keep up the great work. Your teen is learning so much from you!

rows.text: Talking about how we feel can be difficult at first, but you and your teen will get used to it. Keep trying, and you will see the positive results!

text.eng: Talking about how we feel can be difficult at first, but you and your teen will get used to it. Keep trying, and you will see the positive results!

rows.text: Great to hear it went well. Talking about your finances together really makes your family stronger!

text.eng: Great to hear it went well. Talking about your finances together really makes your family stronger!

rows.text: Sorry to hear it was difficult for you. Well done for trying!

text.eng: Sorry to hear it was difficult for you. Well done for trying!

rows.text: Great to hear it went well! Consistent rules help make our teens feel secure, and keep them safe!

text.eng: Great to hear it went well! Consistent rules help make our teens feel secure, and keep them safe!

rows.text: Sorry that this has been difficult. Creating rules together requires some practice but it is worth it!

text.eng: Sorry that this has been difficult. Creating rules together requires some practice but it is worth it!

rows.text: Great to hear it went well!

text.eng: Great to hear it went well!

rows.text: Sorry that this was difficult. Setting consequences together will make your teen want to follow the rules more often!

text.eng: Sorry that this was difficult. Setting consequences together will make your teen want to follow the rules more often!

rows.text: Sorry that this was hard. Sometimes we just have to keep trying. Find a time when you and your teen are calm and try again to talk through a problem using the four steps of problem-solving. Together, you can do so much!

text.eng: Sorry that this was hard. Sometimes we just have to keep trying. Find a time when you and your teen are calm and try again to talk through a problem using the four steps of problem-solving. Together, you can do so much!

rows.text: Great to hear it went well! Talking about risks and support options prevents problems and really helps to keep your teen safe.

text.eng: Great to hear it went well! Talking about risks and support options prevents problems and really helps to keep your teen safe.

rows.text: Sorry that this was hard. Mapping risks and places to get support can be challenging and emotional. It really does help to keep your teen safe!

text.eng: Sorry that this was hard. Mapping risks and places to get support can be challenging and emotional. It really does help to keep your teen safe!

rows.text: Sorry that it didn’t go so well. This is not easy to do. Try to sit down and discuss it with your teen again. Also, is there someone your teen trusts who could join you in the discussion with your teen?

text.eng: Sorry that it didn’t go so well. This is not easy to do. Try to sit down and discuss it with your teen again. Also, is there someone your teen trusts who could join you in the discussion with your teen?

rows.text: Great to hear it went well! Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.

text.eng: Great to hear it went well! Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.

rows.text: Great to hear it went well! When your teen learns how to solve problems, they can use that skill their whole life. What a gift!

text.eng: Great to hear it went well! When your teen learns how to solve problems, they can use that skill their whole life. What a gift!
